trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type= password>" /> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML <see langword="<input type= password>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText> class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>類別，並且可用來建立可讓使用者輸入密碼，單行文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>屬性張貼至伺服器，每次提交表單時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control is not persisted in view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>控制項不會保留在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A> property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.MaxLength%2A>屬性會指定可以在文字方塊中輸入的字元數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A> property allows you to specify the width of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Size%2A>屬性可讓您指定文字方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>屬性來判斷使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>控制項提供<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.ServerChange>事件所引發的時機<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText.Value%2A>屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立事件處理常式，每次引發事件時執行一組自訂的指示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>控制項不提供內建的方式，回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供支援回傳至伺服器，例如網頁上的另一個控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `<input type=text>`, `<input type=password>`, and `<input type=submit>` HTML controls declaratively on a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`<input type=text>`， `<input type=password>`，和`<input type=submit>`以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的 HTML 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML controls programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在呼叫期間，以程式設計方式加入同一個 HTML 控制項`Page_Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword> control using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>控制使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: It creates a `password` type text box control.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立`password`輸入文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "password" literal string.
trans-unit.target: 「 密碼 」 的常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>使用預設建構函式來建立簡單 登入畫面 Web Form 網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 接收轉譯的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the attributes of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword" /> control to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword" /> 控制項的屬性呈現為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.RenderAttributes%2A> method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword.RenderAttributes%2A>方法移除`Value`以防止它所呈現的檢視狀態集合中的屬性，然後呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>方法。
